programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry faces one final threat, and one that forces him to use more than just his alien strength.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry faces one final threat, and one that forces him to use more than just his alien strength.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After losing a hotly contested custody battle, a woman disappears with her 11-month-old daughter; the child's father searches four continents for almost two decades before reaching an emotional conclusion.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A 33-year-old tutor is accused of having an illicit relationship with a teenage student after a racy photograph is discovered on a cell phone; later, her stunning defense will lead to an emotional courtroom battle.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A mother of three married to a missionary is found dead on Valentine's Day; the investigation into the murder reveals answers close to home.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A mother of three married to a missionary is found dead on Valentine's Day; the investigation into the murder reveals answers close to home.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage inside. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An adventurer (Nicolas Cage) must steal the Declaration of Independence and use its hidden map to find a legendary fortune.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: A page from the diary of John Wilkes Booth implicates Ben Gates' (Nicolas Cage) great-great grandfather as a major conspirator in the assassination of President Lincoln.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Featuring a sneak peak of USA's new series, The Rainmaker.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry faces one final threat, and one that forces him to use more than just his alien strength.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 2-year-old girl goes missing, her irresponsible young mother (Hilary Duff) becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Officer Nate Kendall (Wentworth Miller) helps a woman in trouble and gets roped into investigating a rape; when evidence connects multiple cases, the team realizes there may be a serial rapist responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson suspect a sugar daddy (Matt C. Burns) of murder when a young woman's body is found stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman goes missing, her boyfriend points Detectives Benson and Stabler in the direction of convicted bank robber Callum Donovan (Stephen Rea); to comprehend the impact of solitary confinement, Stabler experiences it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist; Fin's family ties to a suspect take him off the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for two suspects that were spotted fleeing the scene after a Muslim woman was assaulted inside a synagogue; Benson is dismayed to find that Rob Miller is out on bail.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenager is found dead in the Hudson River, Lt. Benson suspects Rob Miller is behind the mysterious death but can't prove it; despite having only circumstantial evidence, ADA Stone takes the case to court before Miller can destroy more lives.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: After his estranged father is murdered, an office drone (James McAvoy) joins secret assassins who take their orders from Fate itself.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Kat steps over the line when she suspects a trainer at her boxing gym is taking advantage of his students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Redblacks (2-6) and Argonauts (2-6) fight to escape the East Division cellar. Toronto has won three straight meetings after a 29-16 victory in June. Argos defensive back Derek Slywka returned a fumble 105 yards for a touchdown in that game.

programme.title: MLS Soccer
programme.desc: CF Montréal (4-15-6) and Atlanta United FC (4-11-9) get back to the MLS grind. Both clubs failed to qualify for the Leagues Cup knockout round, but Atlanta ended its event emphatically by clobbering Atlas 4-1. Atlanta beat Montréal 3-2 on Feb. 22.

programme.title: MLS Soccer
programme.desc: Whitecaps FC (13-5-6) and the Earthquakes (7-10-8) resume MLS play. Neither side participated in the Leagues Cup, but Vancouver made headlines Aug. 6 with the signing of former Bayern Munich and German national team star Thomas Müller to a contract.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Stampeders (5-3) try to get right when they host the Blue Bombers (4-3) in the Week 10 finale. Calgary is 2-0 against Winnipeg this season, outscoring the Bombers 78-36, but the Stamps have lost their last two games, against Montreal and Ottawa.

programme.title: Live: IndyCar Racing
programme.desc: The IndyCar Series rolls into Oregon for the Grand Prix of Portland. Álex Palou enters the third-to-last race of the season with a 121-point lead on Pato O'Ward after Palou's win in Monterrey on July 27. The Spaniard won this race in 2021 and 2023.

programme.title: Beyond Their Years: The Incredible Legacies of Herb Carnegie and Buck O'Neil
programme.desc: The lives of sports and social justice icons Herb Carnegie and Buck O'Neil, who because of their race, were excluded from competing at the highest levels of their sports. Both men fought that injustice by working to make the world more inclusive.
